attribute.value: select round(coalesce(sum(jgkh_ywl.bcywl),0),2) as bcywl from khdx_jgcy jgcy left join nbzz_jgkh_ywl jgkh_ywl on jgkh_ywl.khdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh and jgkh_ywl.tjrq=$tjrq_ym$ where jgcy.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq

select round(coalesce(sum(sg.bcywl),0),2) bcywl from khdx_jgcy jgcy inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy2 on jgcy2.jgkhdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy2.qsrq and jgcy2.jsrq and jgcy2.khdxdh!=$khdxdh$ left join sgdr_gybcywl sg on sg.khdxdh=jgcy2.khdxdh and sg.tjrq=$tjrq_ym$ where jgcy.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq

select round(coalesce(sum(jgkh_ywl.bcywl),0),2) as bcywl from khdx_jgcy jgcy left join nbzz_jgkh_ywl jgkh_ywl on jgkh_ywl.khdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh and jgkh_ywl.tjrq=$tjrq_ym$ where jgcy.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq

select round(coalesce(sum(sg.bcywl),0),2) bcywl from khdx_jgcy jgcy inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy2 on jgcy2.jgkhdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy2.qsrq and jgcy2.jsrq and jgcy2.khdxdh!=$khdxdh$ left join sgdr_gybcywl sg on sg.khdxdh=jgcy2.khdxdh and sg.tjrq=$tjrq_ym$ where jgcy.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ SELECT bcywl.TJRQ,jg.JGDH,jg.JGMC,hy.KHDXDH,hy.HYDH,hy.HYMC, coalesce(round(sum(jgkh_ywl.BCYWL),2),0) as JGBCYWL,round(bcywl.BCYWL,2) as BCYWL,bcywl.BZSM, substr(bcywl.TJRQ,1,6) as tjny FROM SGDR_GYBCYWL bcywl INNER JOIN KHDX_HY hy ON hy.KHDXDH = bcywl.KHDXDH INNER JOIN KHDX_JGCY jgcy ON jgcy.KHDXDH = hy.KHDXDH AND $tjrq_ym$ BETWEEN jgcy.QSRQ AND jgcy.JSRQ INNER JOIN KHDX_JG jg ON jg.KHDXDH = jgcy.JGKHDXDH left JOIN NBZZ_JGKH_YWL jgkh_ywl ON jgkh_ywl.KHDXDH = jg.KHDXDH AND jgkh_ywl.TJRQ = $tjrq_ym$ inner join table(fn_getsjjg_java_qxhy($tjrq_ym$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx on qx.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and bcywl.tjrq = $tjrq_ym$ group by bcywl.TJRQ, jg.JGDH, jg.JGMC, hy.KHDXDH, hy.HYDH, hy.HYMC, bcywl.BCYWL, bcywl.BZSM

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( SELECT bcywl.TJRQ,jg.JGDH,jg.JGMC,hy.KHDXDH,hy.HYDH,hy.HYMC, coalesce(round(sum(jgkh_ywl.BCYWL),2),0) as JGBCYWL,round(bcywl.BCYWL,2) as BCYWL,bcywl.BZSM, substr(bcywl.TJRQ,1,6) as tjny FROM SGDR_GYBCYWL bcywl INNER JOIN KHDX_HY hy ON hy.KHDXDH = bcywl.KHDXDH INNER JOIN KHDX_JGCY jgcy ON jgcy.KHDXDH = hy.KHDXDH AND $tjrq_ym$ BETWEEN jgcy.QSRQ AND jgcy.JSRQ INNER JOIN KHDX_JG jg ON jg.KHDXDH = jgcy.JGKHDXDH left JOIN NBZZ_JGKH_YWL jgkh_ywl ON jgkh_ywl.KHDXDH = jg.KHDXDH AND jgkh_ywl.TJRQ = $tjrq_ym$ inner join table(fn_getsjjg_java_qxhy($tjrq_ym$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx on qx.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and bcywl.tjrq = $tjrq_ym$ group by bcywl.TJRQ, jg.JGDH, jg.JGMC, hy.KHDXDH, hy.HYDH, hy.HYMC, bcywl.BCYWL, bcywl.BZSM ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select bcywl, khdxdh, czsj, czr, tjrq, bzsm from SGDR_GYBCYWL where 1= 1 and khdxdh = '$khdxdh$' and tjrq = '$tjrq$'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select bcywl, khdxdh, czsj, czr, tjrq, bzsm from SGDR_GYBCYWL where 1= 1 and khdxdh = '$khdxdh$' and tjrq = '$tjrq_ym$'
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into SGDR_GYBCYWL( bcywl, khdxdh, czr, tjrq, bzsm ) values ( $bcywl$,$khdxdh$,'$czr$',$tjrq_ym$,'$bzsm$')
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update SGDR_GYBCYWL set bcywl = $bcywl$,bzsm = '$bzsm$' where 1=1 and khdxdh = '$khdxdh$' and tjrq = '$tjrq_ym$'
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from SGDR_GYBCYWL where 1=1 and khdxdh = '$khdxdh$' and tjrq = '$tjrq$'
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select round(coalesce(sum(jgkh_ywl.bcywl),0),2) as bcywl from khdx_jgcy jgcy left join nbzz_jgkh_ywl jgkh_ywl on jgkh_ywl.khdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh and jgkh_ywl.tjrq=$tjrq_ym$ where jgcy.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select round(coalesce(sum(sg.bcywl),0),2) bcywl from khdx_jgcy jgcy inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy2 on jgcy2.jgkhdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy2.qsrq and jgcy2.jsrq and jgcy2.khdxdh!=$khdxdh$ left join sgdr_gybcywl sg on sg.khdxdh=jgcy2.khdxdh and sg.tjrq=$tjrq_ym$ where jgcy.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq

javascript.query: jQuery(document).ready(function () { editpage_height=450; editpage_width=500; }); //自定义验证，在提交时执行。通过返回true，否则返回false function customValidate(){ $('#tjrq_ym').val(createTimeObj($('#tjrq').val()).ym); return true; }
javascript.edit: jQuery(document).ready(function () { //这里的js脚本，会在页面加载完成后执行 $('#tjrq_ym').val(createTimeObj($('#tjrq').val() + '01').ym); PAS.di.execute('gybcywlgl_getJgywbcl', getJgywbclFromDb); $('#tjrq').blur(function(){ $('#tjrq_ym').val(createTimeObj($('#tjrq').val()).ym); PAS.di.execute('gybcywlgl_getJgywbcl', getJgywbclFromDb); }); $('#khdxdh').change(function(){ $('#tjrq_ym').val(createTimeObj($('#tjrq').val()).ym); PAS.di.execute('gybcywlgl_getJgywbcl', getJgywbclFromDb); }); if($('#page_operate').val() == 'update'){ $('#tjrq').attr('disabled',true); } }); //自定义验证，在提交时执行。通过返回true，否则返回false function customValidate(){ var bcywl = $('#bcywl').val(); var kfpbcywl = $('#kfpbcywl').val(); if(parseFloat(bcywl) > parseFloat(kfpbcywl)){ custom_alert("柜员补偿业务量必须小于等于可分配补偿业务量!"); return false; } return true; } function getJgywbclFromDb(obj){ if(obj.data.length>0){ var jgbcywl = obj.data[0].BCYWL; $('#jgbcywl').val(new Number(jgbcywl).toFixed(2)); PAS.di.execute('gybcywlgl_getsgdrbcywl', getJgywbclFromDbywl); PAS.di.setDone(obj.sqlid); }else{ custom_alert("当前月份不存在机构补偿业务量！！"); } } function getJgywbclFromDbywl(obj){ if(obj.data.length>0){ var ycz = obj.data[0].BCYWL; var jgbcywl = $('#jgbcywl').val(); $('#kfpbcywl').val(parseFloat(jgbcywl-ycz).toFixed(2)); PAS.di.setDone(obj.sqlid); } }
